title: WODMind.app
description:
WODMind is your training companion built to help you train smarter — not harder. Whether you’re working toward a back squat PR, a daily fitness habit, or looking to break through plateaus, WODMind gives you structure, guidance, and tools to make it happen

Custom plan based on your fitness, progress and goal - strength, endurance, skill

Workout Generator based on your available equipment, goals, and time

Built-in timer to pace your sessions - EMOM, AMRAP etc

Save & Send Workouts to your phone
